AbolishPipelineRun.title: AbolishPipelineRun
AbolishPipelineRun.summary: Terminates the specified deployment process. This operation changes the status of the process to Terminated but does not delete the process. You can still query the process.

AddEntityIntoMetaCollection.title: AddEntityIntoMetaCollection
AddEntityIntoMetaCollection.summary: Adds an entity to a collection in Data Map. Collections include categories and data albums. Entities can be only tables. If you want to add an entity to a data album, the account that you use must be attached the AliyunDataWorksFullAccess policy, or you are the data album creator or administrator.

AssociateProjectToResourceGroup.title: AssociateProjectToResourceGroup
AssociateProjectToResourceGroup.summary: Associates a resource group with a workspace.

AttachDataQualityRulesToEvaluationTask.title: AttachDataQualityRulesToEvaluationTask
AttachDataQualityRulesToEvaluationTask.summary: Associates monitoring rules with a data quality monitoring task.

BatchUpdateTasks.title: BatchUpdateTasks
BatchUpdateTasks.summary: Performs incremental updates on multiple tasks at a time.

CreateAlertRule.title: CreateAlertRule
CreateAlertRule.summary: Creates a custom monitoring alert rule.

CreateComputeResource.title: CreateComputeResource
CreateComputeResource.summary: Creates a computing resource in the specified workspace. The resource can be for a development environment or a production environment.

CreateDIAlarmRule.title: CreateDIAlarmRule
CreateDIAlarmRule.summary: Creates an alert rule for a synchronization task.

CreateDataQualityAlertRule.title: CreateDataQualityAlertRule
CreateDataQualityAlertRule.summary: Creates a data quality monitoring alert rule in a project.

CreateDataQualityEvaluationTask.title: CreateDataQualityEvaluationTask
CreateDataQualityEvaluationTask.summary: Creates a monitor in DataWorks Data Quality.

CreateDataQualityRule.title: CreateDataQualityRule
CreateDataQualityRule.summary: Creates a data quality monitoring rule.

CreateDataQualityRuleTemplate.title: CreateDataQualityRuleTemplate
CreateDataQualityRuleTemplate.summary: Creates a data quality monitoring rule template.

CreateDataQualityScanRun.title: CreateDataQualityScanRun
CreateDataQualityScanRun.summary: Triggers a data quality monitoring task and returns the run instance ID.

CreateDataSource.title: CreateDataSource
CreateDataSource.summary: Adds a data source to the development environment or production environment of a workspace.

CreateDataSourceSharedRule.title: CreateDataSourceSharedRule
CreateDataSourceSharedRule.summary: Creates a rule for sharing a data source to other workspaces or RAM users.

CreateDataset.title: CreateDataset
CreateDataset.summary: Creates a dataset. This operation is supported only in workspaces that the user has joined. Currently, only DataWorks datasets are supported. The maximum number of datasets allowed per tenant is 2,000.

CreateDatasetVersion.title: CreateDatasetVersion
CreateDatasetVersion.summary: Creates a dataset version. Currently supports DataWorks datasets only, with a maximum of 20 versions.

CreateFile.title: CreateFile
CreateFile.summary: Creates a file in DataStudio. You cannot call this operation to create Data Integration nodes.

CreateFunction.title: CreateFunction
CreateFunction.summary: Creates a user-defined function (UDF) in DataStudio. The information about the UDF is described by using FlowSpec.

CreateLineageRelationship.title: CreateLineageRelationship
CreateLineageRelationship.summary: Registers lineage relationships in Data Map. At least one end of the relationship must be a custom object. This interface allows you to connect custom objects (such as external reports or third-party system tables) with metadata entities managed by DataWorks.

CreateMetaCollection.title: CreateMetaCollection
CreateMetaCollection.summary: Creates a collection in Data Map. Collections include categories, subcategories, data albums, and categories that are created in the data albums.

CreateNetwork.title: CreateNetwork
CreateNetwork.summary: Creates a network and associates the network with a general resource group.

CreateNode.title: CreateNode
CreateNode.summary: Creates a node in DataStudio. The information about the node is described by using FlowSpec.

CreatePipelineRun.title: CreatePipelineRun
CreatePipelineRun.summary: Creates a deployment process for entities in the Data Studio (new version).

CreateProjectMember.title: CreateProjectMember
CreateProjectMember.summary: Adds a workspace member and assigns a workspace-level role to the member.

CreateResource.title: CreateResource
CreateResource.summary: \>  You cannot use this API operation to create multiple file resources at a time. If you specify multiple file resources by using FlowSpec, the system creates only the first specified resource.

CreateResourceFile.title: CreateResourceFile
CreateResourceFile.summary: Creates a resource file in DataStudio. The following types are supported: JAR, Archive, File, and Python.

CreateRoute.title: CreateRoute
CreateRoute.summary: Creates a route for a network.

CreateUdfFile.title: CreateUdfFile
CreateUdfFile.summary: Creates a file for a function in DataStudio.

CreateWorkflowDefinition.title: CreateWorkflowDefinition
CreateWorkflowDefinition.summary: Creates a workflow in a directory of DataStudio.

CreateWorkflowInstances.title: CreateWorkflowInstances
CreateWorkflowInstances.summary: Creates a workflow instance, such as a data backfill workflow instance, based on configurations.

DeleteAlertRule.title: DeleteAlertRule
DeleteAlertRule.summary: Deletes a custom monitoring alert rule.

DeleteDIAlarmRule.title: DeleteDIAlarmRule
DeleteDIAlarmRule.summary: Deletes an alert rule configured for a synchronization task.

DeleteDataQualityAlertRule.title: DeleteDataQualityAlertRule
DeleteDataQualityAlertRule.summary: Deletes a data quality alert rule by ID.

DeleteDataQualityEvaluationTask.title: DeleteDataQualityEvaluationTask
DeleteDataQualityEvaluationTask.summary: Deletes a data quality monitoring task.

DeleteDataQualityRule.title: DeleteDataQualityRule
DeleteDataQualityRule.summary: Deletes a data quality monitoring rule.

DeleteDataQualityRuleTemplate.title: DeleteDataQualityRuleTemplate
DeleteDataQualityRuleTemplate.summary: Deletes a data quality monitoring rule template.

DeleteDataQualityTemplate.title: DeleteDataQualityTemplate
DeleteDataQualityTemplate.summary: Deletes a data quality rule template by ID.

DeleteDataSource.title: DeleteDataSource
DeleteDataSource.summary: Removes a data source by ID.

DeleteDataSourceSharedRule.title: DeleteDataSourceSharedRule
DeleteDataSourceSharedRule.summary: Deletes a sharing rule of a data source by ID.

DeleteDataset.title: DeleteDataset
DeleteDataset.summary: Delete a dataset. Only DataWorks datasets are supported. This operation cascades to delete all associated dataset versions. Requires dataset creator or workspace administrator permissions.

DeleteDatasetVersion.title: DeleteDatasetVersion
DeleteDatasetVersion.summary: Deletes a dataset version. Only non-v1 DataWorks datasets are supported. To delete v1 datasets, use the DeleteDataset operation. Requires dataset creator or workspace administrator permissions.

DeleteFile.title: DeleteFile
DeleteFile.summary: Deletes a file from DataStudio. If the file has been committed, an asynchronous process is triggered to delete the file in the scheduling system. The value of the DeploymentId parameter returned is used to call the GetDeployment operation to poll the status of the asynchronous process.

DeleteFunction.title: DeleteFunction
DeleteFunction.summary: Deletes a user-defined function (UDF) in DataStudio.

DeleteLineageRelationship.title: DeleteLineageRelationship
DeleteLineageRelationship.summary: Deletes a lineage in Data Map.

DeleteMetaCollection.title: DeleteMetaCollection
DeleteMetaCollection.summary: Deletes a collection in Data Map. Collections include categories and data albums. If you want to delete a data album, the account that you use must be attached the AliyunDataWorksFullAccess policy, or you are the data album creator or administrator.

DeleteNetwork.title: DeleteNetwork
DeleteNetwork.summary: Disassociates and deletes a network from a general resource group.

DeleteProjectMember.title: DeleteProjectMember
DeleteProjectMember.summary: Removes a workspace member and the workspace-level roles that are assigned to the member.

DeleteRoute.title: DeleteRoute
DeleteRoute.summary: Deletes a route from a network resource.

DetachDataQualityRulesFromEvaluationTask.title: DetachDataQualityRulesFromEvaluationTask
DetachDataQualityRulesFromEvaluationTask.summary: Disassociates monitoring rules from a data quality monitoring task.

DissociateProjectFromResourceGroup.title: DissociateProjectFromResourceGroup
DissociateProjectFromResourceGroup.summary: Disassociates a resource group from a workspace.

EstablishRelationTableToBusiness.title: EstablishRelationTableToBusiness
EstablishRelationTableToBusiness.summary: Imports a table to a workflow. The call to this API operation is equivalent to performing the following operations: Go to the DataStudio page, find the desired workflow, and then click the workflow name. Right-click Table under the desired folder and select Import Table.

ExecPipelineRunStage.title: ExecPipelineRunStage
ExecPipelineRunStage.summary: Executes a stage in a process.

ExecuteAdhocWorkflowInstance.title: ExecuteAdhocWorkflowInstance
ExecuteAdhocWorkflowInstance.summary: Create a temporary workflow instance based on configurations.

GetAlertRule.title: GetAlertRule
GetAlertRule.summary: Queries a custom alert monitoring rule.

GetBusiness.title: GetBusiness
GetBusiness.summary: Queries the information about a workflow.

GetCatalog.title: GetCatalog
GetCatalog.summary: Queries the information about a catalog in Data Map. Only catalogs of the Data Lake Formation (DLF) and StarRocks metadata crawlers are supported.

GetColumn.title: GetColumn
GetColumn.summary: Queries the information about a specific field of a table in Data Map.

GetComputeResource.title: GetComputeResource
GetComputeResource.summary: Queries the specified computing resource based on the computing resource ID.

GetCreateWorkflowInstancesResult.title: GetCreateWorkflowInstancesResult
GetCreateWorkflowInstancesResult.summary: Queries the result of asynchronously creating a workflow instance.

GetDIJob.title: GetDIJob
GetDIJob.summary: Queries the information about a synchronization task.

GetDIJobLog.title: GetDIJobLog
GetDIJobLog.summary: Obtains logs generated for a synchronization task.

GetDataQualityAlertRule.title: GetDataQualityAlertRule
GetDataQualityAlertRule.summary: Queries the details of a data quality monitoring and alerting rule by alert rule ID.

GetDataQualityEvaluationTask.title: GetDataQualityEvaluationTask
GetDataQualityEvaluationTask.summary: Queries the details of a monitor.

GetDataQualityEvaluationTaskInstance.title: GetDataQualityEvaluationTaskInstance
GetDataQualityEvaluationTaskInstance.summary: Queries the details of a monitor instance.

GetDataQualityRule.title: GetDataQualityRule
GetDataQualityRule.summary: Queries the information about a data quality monitoring rule.

GetDataQualityRuleTemplate.title: GetDataQualityRuleTemplate
GetDataQualityRuleTemplate.summary: Queries the information about a data quality monitoring rule template.

GetDataQualityScanRun.title: GetDataQualityScanRun
GetDataQualityScanRun.summary: Creates a data quality monitoring run instance.

GetDataQualityScanRunLog.title: GetDataQualityScanRunLog
GetDataQualityScanRunLog.summary: Queries the log of a specific task instance that monitors data quality.

GetDataQualityTemplate.title: GetDataQualityTemplate
GetDataQualityTemplate.summary: Queries the details of a data quality rule template by ID.

GetDataSource.title: GetDataSource
GetDataSource.summary: Queries a data source by ID.

GetDatabase.title: GetDatabase
GetDatabase.summary: Queries the information about a specific database in Data Map.

GetDataset.title: GetDataset
GetDataset.summary: Gets the details of a dataset.

GetDatasetVersion.title: GetDatasetVersion
GetDatasetVersion.summary: Gets information for a given dataset version.

GetDeploymentPackage.title: GetDeploymentPackage
GetDeploymentPackage.summary: Queries the information about a deployment package.

GetFile.title: GetFile
GetFile.summary: Queries the information about a file.

GetFileVersion.title: GetFileVersion
GetFileVersion.summary: Queries the information about a file version.

GetFolder.title: GetFolder
GetFolder.summary: Queries the information about a folder.

GetFunction.title: GetFunction
GetFunction.summary: Queries the information about a user-defined function (UDF) in DataStudio.

GetIDEEventDetail.title: GetIDEEventDetail
GetIDEEventDetail.summary: Queries the data snapshot of an extension point based on the ID of a message in DataWorks OpenEvent when the related extension point event is triggered.

GetJobStatus.title: GetJobStatus
GetJobStatus.summary: Queries the status information of an asynchronous task. After you call an asynchronous operation, an asynchronous task is generated. You can call the GetJobStatus operation to query the status of the asynchronous task.

GetLineageRelationship.title: GetLineageRelationship
GetLineageRelationship.summary: Queries the information about a lineage in Data Map.

GetMetaCollection.title: GetMetaCollection
GetMetaCollection.summary: Queries the information about a collection in Data Map. Collections include categories and data albums.

GetNetwork.title: GetNetwork
GetNetwork.summary: Queries the information about a network resource.

GetNode.title: GetNode
GetNode.summary: Queries the information about a node in DataStudio.

GetPartition.title: GetPartition
GetPartition.summary: Retrieves partition details for a data map table. Currently supports MaxCompute and HMS (EMR cluster) types only.

GetPipelineRun.title: GetPipelineRun
GetPipelineRun.summary: Queries the information about a process for deploying or undeploying an entity.

GetProject.title: GetProject
GetProject.summary: Queries the information about a DataWorks workspace.

GetProjectMember.title: GetProjectMember
GetProjectMember.summary: Queries the details about a member in a workspace.

GetProjectRole.title: GetProjectRole
GetProjectRole.summary: Queries the information about a role in a DataWorks workspace.

GetRerunWorkflowInstancesResult.title: GetRerunWorkflowInstancesResult
GetRerunWorkflowInstancesResult.summary: Query the result of asynchronous workflow instance reruns.

GetResource.title: GetResource
GetResource.summary: Queries the information about a file resource.

GetResourceGroup.title: GetResourceGroup
GetResourceGroup.summary: Queries the information about a resource group based on its ID.

GetRoute.title: GetRoute
GetRoute.summary: Queries the information about a route based on its ID.

GetSchema.title: GetSchema
GetSchema.summary: Queries the information about a schema in Data Map. You can call this API operation to query the information only about MaxCompute and Hologres schemas.

GetTable.title: GetTable
GetTable.summary: Queries the information about a specific table in Data Map.

GetTask.title: GetTask
GetTask.summary: Queries the information about a task.

GetTaskInstance.title: GetTaskInstance
GetTaskInstance.summary: Queries the information about an instance.

GetTaskInstanceLog.title: GetTaskInstanceLog
GetTaskInstanceLog.summary: Queries the run log generated during a specific run of an instance.

GetWorkflow.title: GetWorkflow
GetWorkflow.summary: Queries the information about a workflow.

GetWorkflowDefinition.title: GetWorkflowDefinition
GetWorkflowDefinition.summary: Queries the information about a workflow.

GetWorkflowInstance.title: GetWorkflowInstance
GetWorkflowInstance.summary: Queries the information about a workflow instance.

GrantMemberProjectRoles.title: GrantMemberProjectRoles
GrantMemberProjectRoles.summary: Assigns roles to members in a workspace.

ImportWorkflowDefinition.title: ImportWorkflowDefinition
ImportWorkflowDefinition.summary: Imports a workflow and its child nodes that are specified by the FlowSpec field to DataStudio.

ListAlertRules.title: ListAlertRules
ListAlertRules.summary: Queries a list of custom monitoring alert rules.

ListCatalogs.title: ListCatalogs
ListCatalogs.summary: Queries a list of catalogs in Data Map. Only catalogs of the Data Lake Formation (DLF) and StarRocks metadata crawler types are supported. For the DLF metadata crawler type, all supported data catalogs are returned. For the StarRocks metadata crawler type, data catalogs in a specific instance are returned.

ListCertificates.title: ListCertificates
ListCertificates.summary: Queries a list of certificate files.

ListColumns.title: ListColumns
ListColumns.summary: Queries a list of fields in a data table in Data Map.

ListComputeResources.title: ListComputeResources
ListComputeResources.summary: Queries the list of computing resources that meet the specified business information.

ListCrawlerTypes.title: ListCrawlerTypes
ListCrawlerTypes.summary: Queries a list of metadata crawler types supported in Data Map. The subtypes of the types and the hierarchical relationship between the subtypes are also returned.

ListDIAlarmRules.title: ListDIAlarmRules
ListDIAlarmRules.summary: Views alert rules configured for a synchronization task.

ListDIJobEvents.title: ListDIJobEvents
ListDIJobEvents.summary: Queries events for a synchronization task.

ListDIJobMetrics.title: ListDIJobMetrics
ListDIJobMetrics.summary: Queries metrics for a synchronization task.

ListDIJobRunDetails.title: ListDIJobRunDetails
ListDIJobRunDetails.summary: Queries the running information about a synchronization task.

ListDIJobs.title: ListDIJobs
ListDIJobs.summary: Queries a list of new-version synchronization tasks in Data Integration. A new-version synchronization task can be a real-time synchronization task used to synchronize full or incremental data in a database, a batch synchronization task used to synchronize full or incremental data in a database, or a real-time synchronization task used to synchronize incremental data in a single table.

ListDataAssets.title: ListDataAssets
ListDataAssets.summary: Queries the information about DataWorks data assets to which tags are added by page.

ListDataQualityAlertRules.title: ListDataQualityAlertRules
ListDataQualityAlertRules.summary: Queries the list of data quality alert rules in a project.

ListDataQualityEvaluationTaskInstances.title: ListDataQualityEvaluationTaskInstances
ListDataQualityEvaluationTaskInstances.summary: Queries a list of instances generated by a data quality monitoring task by page.

ListDataQualityEvaluationTasks.title: ListDataQualityEvaluationTasks
ListDataQualityEvaluationTasks.summary: Queries a list of data quality monitoring tasks by page.

ListDataQualityRuleTemplates.title: ListDataQualityRuleTemplates
ListDataQualityRuleTemplates.summary: Queries a list of data quality monitoring rule templates.

ListDataQualityRules.title: ListDataQualityRules
ListDataQualityRules.summary: Queries a list of data quality monitoring rules by page.

ListDataQualityScanRuns.title: ListDataQualityScanRuns
ListDataQualityScanRuns.summary: Queries the execution records of data quality scans in a project.

ListDataQualityScans.title: ListDataQualityScans
ListDataQualityScans.summary: Queries the list of data quality scan tasks in a project.

ListDataQualityTemplates.title: ListDataQualityTemplates
ListDataQualityTemplates.summary: Queries the list of data quality rule templates in a project.

ListDataSourceSharedRules.title: ListDataSourceSharedRules
ListDataSourceSharedRules.summary: Queries a list of sharing rules of a data source.

ListDataSources.title: ListDataSources
ListDataSources.summary: Queries a list of data sources based on the business information of data sources.

ListDatabases.title: ListDatabases
ListDatabases.summary: Queries a list of databases in an instance, cluster, or data catalog in Data Map. For DLF or StarRocks data sources, you can call this API operation to query databases in a data catalog. For StarRocks data sources, you can call this API operation to query databases in internal catalogs. For other types of data sources, you can call this API operation to query databases in an instance or cluster.

ListDatasetVersions.title: ListDatasetVersions
ListDatasetVersions.summary: Retrieves the version list for a given dataset.

ListDatasets.title: ListDatasets
ListDatasets.summary: Queries a list of datasets. Currently, DataWorks datasets and PAI datasets are supported.

ListDeploymentPackageFiles.title: ListDeploymentPackageFiles
ListDeploymentPackageFiles.summary: Queries a list of versions of files to be deployed.

ListDeploymentPackages.title: ListDeploymentPackages
ListDeploymentPackages.summary: Queries a list of deployment packages.

ListDownstreamTaskInstances.title: ListDownstreamTaskInstances
ListDownstreamTaskInstances.summary: Queries a list of descendant instances of an instance by page.

ListDownstreamTasks.title: ListDownstreamTasks
ListDownstreamTasks.summary: Queries a list of descendant tasks of a task by page.

ListEntitiesInMetaCollection.title: ListEntitiesInMetaCollection
ListEntitiesInMetaCollection.summary: Queries a list of entities in a collection in Data Map. Collections include categories and data albums. Entities can only be tables.

ListFileVersions.title: ListFileVersions
ListFileVersions.summary: Queries a list of file versions.

ListFunctions.title: ListFunctions
ListFunctions.summary: Queries a list of user-defined functions (UDFs) in DataStudio. You can also specify filter conditions to query specific UDFs.

ListLineageRelationships.title: ListLineageRelationships
ListLineageRelationships.summary: Queries the lineage between two entities, such as tables, fields, and Object Storage Service (OSS) files, in Data Map.

ListLineages.title: ListLineages
ListLineages.summary: Queries a list of ancestor and descendant entities of an entity in Data Map. You can specify whether to return the lineage between the entities.

ListMetaCollections.title: ListMetaCollections
ListMetaCollections.summary: Queries a list of collections in Data Map. Collections include categories and data albums.

ListNetworks.title: ListNetworks
ListNetworks.summary: Queries a list of network resources of a serverless resource group.

ListNodeDependencies.title: ListNodeDependencies
ListNodeDependencies.summary: Queries a list of descendant nodes of a node in DataStudio.

ListNodes.title: ListNodes
ListNodes.summary: Queries a list of nodes in DataStudio. You can also specify filter conditions to query specific nodes.

ListPartitions.title: ListPartitions
ListPartitions.summary: Queries a list of partitions in a table in Data Map. Only tables of the MaxCompute and E-MapReduce (EMR)-type Hive Metastore Service (HMS) metadata crawlers are supported.

ListPipelineRunItems.title: ListPipelineRunItems
ListPipelineRunItems.summary: Queries the information about deployment objects by deployment process ID.

ListPipelineRuns.title: ListPipelineRuns
ListPipelineRuns.summary: Queries a list of processes that are used to deploy or undeploy entities in DataStudio. You can also specify filter conditions to query specific processes.

ListProjectMembers.title: ListProjectMembers
ListProjectMembers.summary: Queries details about members in a workspace.

ListProjectRoles.title: ListProjectRoles
ListProjectRoles.summary: Queries the information about roles in a DataWorks workspace by page.

ListProjects.title: ListProjects
ListProjects.summary: Queries a list of DataWorks workspaces of the tenant to which your account belongs.

ListResourceGroupAssociateProjects.title: ListResourceGroupAssociateProjects
ListResourceGroupAssociateProjects.summary: Gets the list of workspaces bound to a resource group.

ListResourceGroupMetricData.title: ListResourceGroupMetricData
ListResourceGroupMetricData.summary: Queries the metric data of a resource group.

ListResourceGroups.title: ListResourceGroups
ListResourceGroups.summary: Queries a list of resource groups.

ListResources.title: ListResources
ListResources.summary: Queries a list of file resources in DataStudio. You can also specify filter conditions to query specific file resources.

ListRoutes.title: ListRoutes
ListRoutes.summary: Queries a list of routes of a network resource.

ListSchemas.title: ListSchemas
ListSchemas.summary: Queries a list of schemas in a database or a MaxCompute project in Data Map. Only schemas of the MaxCompute and Hologres metadata crawler types are supported.

ListTables.title: ListTables
ListTables.summary: Queries a list of tables in Data Map. For data source types that do not support schemas, you can call this API operation to query a list of tables in a specific database. For data source types that support schemas, you can call this API operation to query a list of tables in a specific database, MaxCompute project, or schema. Only the basic information about tables is returned. The information about technical metadata and business metadata is not returned.

ListTaskInstanceOperationLogs.title: ListTaskInstanceOperationLogs
ListTaskInstanceOperationLogs.summary: Queries a list of operation logs of an instance by page.

ListTaskInstances.title: ListTaskInstances
ListTaskInstances.summary: Queries a list of instances. You can also specify filter conditions to query specific instances.

ListTaskOperationLogs.title: ListTaskOperationLogs
ListTaskOperationLogs.summary: Queries a list of operation logs of a task by page.

ListTasks.title: ListTasks
ListTasks.summary: Queries a list of tasks by page. You can also specify filter conditions to query tasks.

ListUpstreamTaskInstances.title: ListUpstreamTaskInstances
ListUpstreamTaskInstances.summary: Queries a list of ancestor instances of an instance by page.

ListUpstreamTasks.title: ListUpstreamTasks
ListUpstreamTasks.summary: Queries a list of ancestor tasks of a task by page.

ListWorkflowDefinitions.title: ListWorkflowDefinitions
ListWorkflowDefinitions.summary: Queries a list of workflows in DataStudio. You can also specify filter conditions to query specific workflows.

ListWorkflowInstances.title: ListWorkflowInstances
ListWorkflowInstances.summary: Queries a list of workflow instances by page. You can also specify filter conditions to query workflow instances.

ListWorkflows.title: ListWorkflows
ListWorkflows.summary: Queries a list of workflows by page. You can also specify filter conditions to query workflows.

MoveFunction.title: MoveFunction
MoveFunction.summary: Moves a user-defined function (UDF) to a path in DataStudio.

MoveNode.title: MoveNode
MoveNode.summary: Moves a node to a path in DataStudio.

MoveResource.title: MoveResource
MoveResource.summary: Moves a file resource to a path in DataStudio.

MoveWorkflowDefinition.title: MoveWorkflowDefinition
MoveWorkflowDefinition.summary: Moves a workflow to a path in DataStudio.

PreviewDatasetVersion.title: PreviewDatasetVersion
PreviewDatasetVersion.summary: Previews the content of a specified dataset version. Currently only text file preview is supported for OSS-type datasets. Supported MIME types 1. application/json 2. application/xml 3. text/html 4. text/plain 5. application/octet-stream

RemoveEntityFromMetaCollection.title: RemoveEntityFromMetaCollection
RemoveEntityFromMetaCollection.summary: Removes an entity from a collection in Data Map. Collections include categories and data albums. Entities can be only tables. If you want to remove an entity from a data album, the account that you use must be attached the AliyunDataWorksFullAccess policy, or you are the data album creator or administrator.

RemoveTaskInstanceDependencies.title: RemoveTaskInstanceDependencies
RemoveTaskInstanceDependencies.summary: Removes multiple upstream dependencies of an instance at a time.

RenameFunction.title: RenameFunction
RenameFunction.summary: Renames a user-defined function (UDF) in DataStudio.

RenameResource.title: RenameResource
RenameResource.summary: Renames a file resource in DataStudio.

RerunTaskInstances.title: RerunTaskInstances
RerunTaskInstances.summary: Reruns multiple instances at a time.

ResumeTaskInstances.title: ResumeTaskInstances
ResumeTaskInstances.summary: Resumes multiple suspended instances at a time.

RevokeMemberProjectRoles.title: RevokeMemberProjectRoles
RevokeMemberProjectRoles.summary: Revokes roles that are assigned to a member in a workspace.

SetSuccessTaskInstances.title: SetSuccessTaskInstances
SetSuccessTaskInstances.summary: Sets the statuses of multiple instances to successful at a time.

StartWorkflowInstances.title: StartWorkflowInstances
StartWorkflowInstances.summary: Starts multiple workflow instances at a time.

StopTaskInstances.title: StopTaskInstances
StopTaskInstances.summary: Stops multiple instances at a time.

StopWorkflowInstances.title: StopWorkflowInstances
StopWorkflowInstances.summary: Stops multiple workflow instances at a time.

SubmitFile.title: SubmitFile
SubmitFile.summary: Commits a file to the development environment of the scheduling system to generate a task.

SuspendTaskInstances.title: SuspendTaskInstances
SuspendTaskInstances.summary: Suspends multiple instances at a time.

TestDataSourceConnectivity.title: TestDataSourceConnectivity
TestDataSourceConnectivity.summary: Tests the connectivity between a data source and a resource group.

TriggerSchedulerTaskInstance.title: TriggerSchedulerTaskInstance
TriggerSchedulerTaskInstance.summary: Triggers a task to run by using an HTTP Trigger node at a specified time.

UpdateAlertRule.title: UpdateAlertRule
UpdateAlertRule.summary: Updates the information about a custom alert monitoring rule.

UpdateColumnBusinessMetadata.title: UpdateColumnBusinessMetadata
UpdateColumnBusinessMetadata.summary: Updates the business metadata of a column in a table in Data Map. Only the business description of a column can be updated.

UpdateComputeResource.title: UpdateComputeResource
UpdateComputeResource.summary: Modifies the specified computing resource based on the computing resource ID.

UpdateDIAlarmRule.title: UpdateDIAlarmRule
UpdateDIAlarmRule.summary: Updates an alert rule configured for a synchronization task.

UpdateDataQualityAlertRule.title: UpdateDataQualityAlertRule
UpdateDataQualityAlertRule.summary: Updates a specified data quality monitoring alert rule.

UpdateDataQualityRule.title: UpdateDataQualityRule
UpdateDataQualityRule.summary: Updates a data quality monitoring rule.

UpdateDataQualityRuleTemplate.title: UpdateDataQualityRuleTemplate
UpdateDataQualityRuleTemplate.summary: Updates a data quality monitoring rule template.

UpdateDataQualityTemplate.title: UpdateDataQualityTemplate
UpdateDataQualityTemplate.summary: Updates a data quality rule template in a project

UpdateDataSource.title: UpdateDataSource
UpdateDataSource.summary: Modifies a data source by ID.

UpdateDataset.title: UpdateDataset
UpdateDataset.summary: Updates dataset information. Only DataWorks datasets are supported. The operator must be the creator of the dataset or the administrator of the workspace where the dataset is located.

UpdateDatasetVersion.title: UpdateDatasetVersion
UpdateDatasetVersion.summary: Updates dataset version information. Only DataWorks datasets are supported. Requires dataset creator or workspace administrator permissions.

UpdateIDEEventResult.title: UpdateIDEEventResult
UpdateIDEEventResult.summary: Recalls the check result of the message of an extension point event.

UpdateMetaCollection.title: UpdateMetaCollection
UpdateMetaCollection.summary: Updates the information about a collection in Data Map, including the collection name, description, and administrator. Collections include categories and data albums. If you want to update the information about a data album, the account that you use must be attached the AliyunDataWorksFullAccess policy, or you are the data album creator or administrator.

UpdateNode.title: UpdateNode
UpdateNode.summary: Updates the basic information about a node in DataStudio. This API operation performs an incremental update. The update information is described by using FlowSpec.

UpdateResource.title: UpdateResource
UpdateResource.summary: Updates the basic information about a file resource in DataStudio. This API operation performs an incremental update. The update information is described by using FlowSpec.

UpdateResourceGroup.title: UpdateResourceGroup
UpdateResourceGroup.summary: Updates basic information about a resource group.

UpdateRoute.title: UpdateRoute
UpdateRoute.summary: Updates the information about a route.

UpdateTableBusinessMetadata.title: UpdateTableBusinessMetadata
UpdateTableBusinessMetadata.summary: Updates the business metadata of a table in Data Map. Currently, only the usage notes of a table can be updated.

UpdateTask.title: UpdateTask
UpdateTask.summary: Update a task. The changes are synchronized to Data Studio, which creates a new saved version.

UpdateTaskInstances.title: UpdateTaskInstances
UpdateTaskInstances.summary: Modifies properties configured for multiple instances at a time. The properties include the priority, resource group for scheduling, and data source.

UpdateUdfFile.title: UpdateUdfFile
UpdateUdfFile.summary: Updates the file information about a function.

UpdateWorkflow.title: UpdateWorkflow
UpdateWorkflow.summary: Updates a specified workflow in full update mode.

UpdateWorkflowDefinition.title: UpdateWorkflowDefinition
UpdateWorkflowDefinition.summary: Updates the basic information about a workflow in DataStudio. This API operation performs an incremental update. The update information is described by using FlowSpec.
